name: Inferno (Meadows)
overview:
Inferno is a one or two player video game simulating every kids dream at
one time or another of being a fireman (or a "fireperson" in keeping with
the current vernacular).

The player(s) control the movement and position of the firefighter on the
ladder moving in a vertical direction on the outside left and right edges
of the T.V. monitor. The player(s) also control the movement and position
of the firetruck moving in a horizontal direction on the extreme bottom
edge of the T.V. monitor.
